title: Solve For Unknown Using Quadratic Formula
text: Given $$\left(2l-6\right) l=140$$, use quadratic formula to solve for l. We get the length $$l=-7$$ or $$10$$. Given that length of rectangle has to be positive, we can omit the negative answer. Therefore, the length is $$10$$.

title: Find the Length
text: Given the length is $$10$$, the width is six less than twice the length. What is the width?
